headline: Sarah Martin Joins Lennox as Executive Vice President and President of Home Comfort Solutions
summary: Lennox (NYSE:LII), a leading provider of innovative climate control solutions, today announced the appointment of Sarah Martin to executive vice president and president of Home Comfort Solutions, effective April 28. Martin succeeds Gary Bedard, who will retire from Lennox at the end of April after 26 years of dedicated service with the company.
